dc:title: Licensed Vehicles
dc:description: Number of licensed vehicles by different vehicle and ownership categories. Specific data concerning ultra-low emission vehicles (ULEV), inc. battery electric vehicles (BEV), plug-in hybrid electric vehicles (PHEV) and all plug-in electric vehicles is available as a separate dataset.

columns.dc:description: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code for a Local Authority geographic area.
Name of the Local Authority to which the data relates.

The particular classification of licensed vehicle. In the 'licensed_ulev_...csv' datasets 'BEV', 'PHEV' and 'plug-in electric' are subsets of ULEV. In the 'licensed_vehicles_...csv' datasets 'diesel cars' and 'diesel vans' are subsets of the other categories present.
The year in which the data relates to, expressed as a number in the format YYYY.

The calendar quarter in which the data relates to, expressed as a number between 1-4. All data is correct as at the end of the quarter. Data that is only reported annually has been recorded as quarter 4 for consistency.
A date expressed in the format YYYY-MM-DD representing the end of the calendar quarter recorded in the 'year' and 'quarter' fields.
A numeric count of the licensed vehicles belonging to the category expressed in the 'category' field.
